name: Get_Question_And_Answer

docs_row.name: Get_Question_And_Answer
docs_row.func_description: Retrieve the question and answer information for a specified hotel.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

hotel_id.description:
hotel_id can be retrieved from api/v1/hotels/searchHotels(Search Hotels) or api/v1/hotels/searchHotelsByCoordinates(Search Hotels By Coordinates
) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed

q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?

q_and_a_pairs.answer: The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days
observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

observation.average_response_time: This property usually replies within a few days

q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Deluxe Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.question: Is there a hand shower
Hi i have elderly parents and they would arrive in domestic flight and would be travelling on international flight . do you offer early check in around 11am?
q_and_a_pairs.room_name: Superior Room City View King Bed
q_and_a_pairs.answer: Yes sir, we can provide the same subject to availability at the time of arrival.
The swimming pool is operational from 06:00 to 22:00 hours daily.
q_and_a_pairs.question: Hello. Do you have swimming pool and is it available to use now? Best regards, Tatiana

observation.average_response_time_text: Subject to availability at the property

response_summary: The hotel has received several guest inquiries, with responses provided by the property. One guest asked if the Deluxe Room City View King Bed has a hand shower, to which the hotel confirmed with a simple "Yes," receiving 29 votes for helpfulness. Another guest inquired about early check-in around 11 AM for elderly parents traveling between flights, and the hotel responded that they could accommodate the request, subject to availability upon arrival. This answer was well-received with 27 votes. A third question was about the swimming pool's availability, and the hotel clarified that it operates daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, earning 25 votes for clarity. On average, the property responds to questions within a few days, though availability may vary. The hotel actively engages with guest queries and has not opted out of the Q&A feature.
enhance_func_desc: This API is useful for travelers seeking property-specific details before booking. It retrieves guest questions and hotel responses, covering amenities, policies, and special requests. Users can view verified answers from the property, including helpfulness ratings, to make informed decisions. The response includes details like check-in flexibility, facility hours, and other guest concerns, aiding in trip planning. The hotel ID must be obtained from the SearchHotels API.

enhanced_parameters.hotel_id: Unique identifier for the hotel, sourced from searchHotels or searchHotelsByCoordinates.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data (e.g., 'en-us' for English).

q_and_a_pairs.description: List of question and answer pairs between guests and the hotel.

ar_items.description: A single question and answer pair.

naive_sentiment.description: A sentiment score indicating the tone of the answer (higher values indicate more positive sentiment).

translated_answer.description: The translated version of the answer, if applicable.

hidden.description: Indicates whether the Q&A pair is hidden (0 = visible, 1 = hidden).

is_or_could_be_translated.description: Indicates if the answer could be translated or not.

asked_at.description: Timestamp when the question was asked (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

sign_off.description: Optional sign-off message from the responder.

answered_at.description: Timestamp when the answer was provided (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).

language.description: Language code of the question and answer (e.g., 'en' for English).

answer.description: The hotel's response to the guest's question.

answer_time_epoch.description: Unix epoch timestamp when the answer was provided.

answered_at_formatted.description: Formatted timestamp of when the answer was provided (same as 'answered_at').

room_id.description: Unique identifier for the room type, if applicable.

ask_time_epoch.description: Unix epoch timestamp when the question was asked.

room_name.description: Name of the room type, if applicable.

px_upsort_covid_q_and_a_ds_model__would_.description: A flag indicating relevance to COVID-19 or resort-related questions (1 = relevant).

translated_question.description: The translated version of the question, if applicable.

votes.description: Number of helpful votes received for the answer.

average_response_time.description: General description of the hotel's average response time (e.g., 'within a few days').

collect_q_and_a_questions.description: Flag indicating whether the hotel collects Q&A questions (1 = enabled, 0 = disabled).

hotel_id.description: Unique identifier for the hotel (string representation).

average_response_time_text.description: Additional text clarifying the response time (e.g., 'Subject to availability at the property').

opted_out_of_q_and_a.description: Flag indicating whether the hotel has opted out of Q&A (0 = active, 1 = opted out).

success.description: Indicates whether the API request was successful (1 = success, 0 = failure).
